http.title: Lichfield District Council - Homepage
http.html:
Skip to content
Potential text message council tax scam

Some of our customers have told us that they have received a text message telling them to visit a govgroup website to claim a refund on council tax. This is a scam.

We never send customers text messages about council tax refunds and would advise all customers to delete such text messages and to not visit linked websites.

Thank you,

The revenues and benefits team

Get in touch or visit...

Our location and travel details >>

Phone our contact centre: 01543 308 000
District Council House, Frog Lane, Lichfield, Staffs, WS13 6YY

If you need to contact a team direct, please visit our contacts page for team phone numbers and email addresses.

Opening times

Our main reception at Frog Lane in Lichfield is open Monday - Friday, 8.45am - 5.15pm. Our phone lines close at 5pm.
